title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 845.1 - Adopting orders
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 845.1 - Adopting orders

State Regulations
(a) Pursuant to
the authority contained in article 6 of the Public Health Law, the Water

Pollution Control Board, having made proper studies and having held a public
hearing on due notice with reference thereto, adopts and assigns the following
classifications and standards of quality and purity to the various waters
specifically designated and described below and subject to the definitions and
conditions as stated herein. (b) Pursuant to article 12 of the Public Health Law, the Water Resources

Commission, after proper study and following a public hearing conducted by the
former Water Pollution Control Board, held on due notice, adopts amendments to
the classifications and standards of quality and purity assigned to fresh
surface waters of the Mill Creek drainage basin to change item numbers 3, 5, 6, 8, 10, 11, 12, and 14 in table I, section
845.5, infra, as hereinafter
defined. This adoption and assignment of standards of quality and purity to the
designated waters, as amended, shall be effective May 1, 1963. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
845.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
